author: pmoore222
text: I had a short in my outlet and blew the circuit. I called First Electric and Mike was here within 30 minutes. He quickly evaluated the situation and fixed it quickly. I appreciated the time Mike took to explain to me what happened and Mike is also very personable. Great job!

author: Claudia C
text: Michael supported us for an emergency visit after I noticed a loud popping sound and light spark overnight. He was professional, thorough, and informative. Michael was attentive to our concerns and provided excellent service!

text: Thank you, Michael!  Not only was Michael highly recommended, but he delivered...and delivered more reasonably than any of the other bids I got.  He was professional, kind, and ensured everything was working before he left because another â€¦

text: I had a great experience with First Electric. They came out to fix some wiring issues at my house and did an excellent job. The work was done quickly, safely, and with great attention to detail. They explained everything clearly, answered â€¦

author: Judelyn Vallesteros
text: Michael was great to work with. He was very responsive and his quote was competitive. He made working with him easy and proved he is reliable with the job he promised to do. We appreciated his suggestions and he made sure he cleaned up after himself. We highly recommend him.

text: By far the best experience I have ever had.  I made a call to First Electric, Michael picked up the call and the very next day was at my property.  By the end of the day he called me back and provided me with a detailed assessment of what â€¦

text: Michael with First Electric did an excellent job.   He did the work as requested, for a good price, and on time.  He was polite and communicated clearly.  He also did a nice job keeping the worksites clean.  We will be working with Michael again.

author: Rick
text: Great experience, everything went smoothly. All my questions were answered. All work was done to code and all inspections were done quickly with no problems. I would highly recommend First Electric.            Rick Castellanos

text: Michael the technician is honest and doesn't try to charge you for anything unnecessary. One thing he does that other electricians dont is he uses the diagnostic charge towards your repair if a repair is needed. Not many are this honest and â€¦

text: Wow. Michael repaired my electrical problem quickly and efficiently.  I own two homes on one lot and he knew 100% how to find and repair.  He is now our electrician for my homes.

author: Candace Shih
text: Michael was able to come on short notice and help me with multiple issues in our home. He is friendly and very professional. We appreciate how responsive he was via text/phone and his efficiency in fixing our electrical issues.

text: Prompt to the appointment, great work friendly staff. Looking forward to having them help with all my electrical work!

text: Michael was professional, prompt, very courteous and polite. I would highly recommend First Electric.

text: Michael came to install 4 ceiling fans, a Tesla charger, and a new outlet in the bathroom. â€¦

text: Michael was prompt, punctual and professional. Highly recommend for anyone who needs reliable electrical service.

text: I recently had First Electric upgrade my electrical panel, and I couldnâ€™t be happier with the experience! Michael came over to do the work, and he was super friendly and really knew his stuff. He explained everything in a way that made â€¦

text: Very fast (on time) and professional company and very informative as well helped diagnose with solar panels issues, thank you!

author: Mark Rubens
text: Michael provided the best customer service and the most professional work.

text: Electric panel upgrade,  he was polite, professional and very helpful

text: Michael installed an EV Charger for me.He answers the phone and texts promptly which is very much appreciated.He finished the job efficiently and correctly and his prices are fair and reasonable. Highly recommended . ðŸ‘Œ â€¦

text: I would highly recommend him. He knows systems as well.

text: Very professional... quick service and very clear explain was big helpful...

text: Service was exceptional and professional. Work was completed within the proposed time. Will use again in the future.

author: Christopher Julian Meza
text: Great service! Very fast and very professional

author: Christina Cabral
text: Excellent job!

author: Samayoa Eddy
text: Clean professional job, verry professional and great service.

author: Naida Halsig
text: Prompt, friendly and did a great job.

author: Brogan
text: Noice logo

author: Adrian Monje
text: Adrian Monjeî—”

author: Larbaca2 C.
text: Michael repaired my electrical problem quickly and efficiently.   Excellent manners and he is now our electrician for my homes.  Just Perfect. Aj Cabral

author: Mark R.
text: Called First Electric on Friday morning and requested him to come and look at my electrical panel.  We met later that day which was perfect timing. He diagnosed the panel and suggested I do a panel upgrade. He flipped the breakers and found one of them arcing with a little flame.  He said he could not leave with electricity connected because of the fire risk. He said he would go home and write up a quote and email it to me that night. His price was so much lower than the quotes I had for a panel replacement.  I agreed to have this done and he said he would order the parts Friday night and pick up the parts Saturday morning and be at my house to do the job around 10:00am.He was here on time and got to work. It took him till about 3:30-4:00pm to complete the job.I highly recommend First Electric for all  your electrical needs.Honest, friendly, and does what he says he will do??MarkBrea CA

author: Matigas U.
location: West Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA
text: Michael was extremely professional. He arrived on time and provided an excellent quote--so good that we couldn't turn it down. He got to work immediately and completed the job in no time. He came highly recommended, and now I understand why. I will definitely use his company again for both business and personal projects.

author: W M.
text: I needed an electrical panel upgrade so I went to YELP for a referral. I requested several quotes and Michael was the first to respond (within minutes). We scheduled an appointment for the following day. He showed up at the precise scheduled time and thoroughly inspected the project and gave me a detailed plan on what was needed. After evaluating several other companies, I decided to go with Michael. His wasn't the most expensive nor cheapest but his professionalism helped make my decision.He pulled the permit and contacted Edison before starting the job. About a week later we scheduled an appointment for installation, most of which was completed the first day. He came back the next to finish up a few things (cleaning the area each day.) He scheduled his patch & repair person in the following days and the final inspection. My only complaint would be that his patch & repair person was not as meticulous about cleaning the area after he finished his job. Otherwise, from start to finish I am pleased with the outcome. I told Michael he's my electrician for life now!! Don't hesitate in hiring him - you won't be disappointed.

author: MAro A.
text: By far the best experience I have ever had.  I made a call to First Electric, Michael picked up the call and the very next day was at my property.  By the end of the day he called me back and provided me with a detailed assessment of what needed to be done.  He worked with me and the very next day he went to work.  Michael texted me he was in his way, provided updates and contacted me once he was done.  Great experience.  I highly recommend!

author: John U.
text: Michael was awesome. Helped us replace/upgrade a couple of light fixtures and did a great job. The lights give our place a more modern look.He was efficient and I would definitely recommend!

author: Eric G.
text: Michael saved us on a Sunday afternoon when one of our outlets started SMOKING! He came over, was super professional, and helped get us to a point where we could safely get the electricity turned back on. He fixed up some of our other wiring issues and gave us a couple quotes for other services (not including the attempted IT help ). He came back a few days later and installed a new microwave for us as ours had also recently gone the way of the dinosaur. Yes the house is apparently falling apart. But when we need electric help in the future, Michael is our first call. Thanks!

author: Jay L.
text: Considering I interact with all kinds of contractors in my line of work, I know how much of a pain they can be to deal with so I d give out 5 stars lightly. Working with Michael was an absolute breeze from start to finish. He responded to my request promptly, took my call right away, was upfront with pricing, showed up on time, very friendly, explained everything clearly, didn't try to upsell me on unnecessary work and got the outlet replaced in half an hour. I would not hesitate to call him again and will happily recommend him to anyone I know in the area who needs an electrician. This is the kind of customer service you want.

author: Caitlin F.
text: Michael came to install 4 ceiling fans, a Tesla charger, and a new outlet in the bathroom.He gave me a good price. Saying I had to write him a good review. I got busy with personal issues at home. But I knew I might call him again for more work around the house. And I'd write the review later. He quotes me almost triple the price, this time. Saying his prices have changed. And badgering me about how I didn't write the review.He says he's thinking about adhering to the same price as our first job, if I write the review.I write him a nice review.Show it to him. He tells me, I should've written the review two months ago, and he won't change his pricing.So here we are. I don't like people who manipulate for a review.

author: BiBI C.
text: Michael is nimble and responsive. I used Michael's service for installing my EV wall box charger and Flood lights. He not only provides customer solution but also discusses options in depths, then executes the job with professionalism.Job's well done

author: Judz V.
text: Michael was responsive and able to provide a quote quickly for areas we requested services on. His quote was competitive. He also provided good suggestions when he came to check out the areas needing work. He was friendly and professional. He completed his work with no issues and made sure he cleaned up after himself after he was done with the service. We felt the price we paid was well worth his workmanship. We highly recommend him for any electrical needs.

author: thebobster 1.
text: Michael the technician is honest and doesn't try to charge you for anything unnecessary. One thing he does that other electricians dont is he uses the diagnostic charge towards your repair if a repair is needed. Not many are this honest and his prices are much more fair compared to the competition. He is forsure my go to Ev charger technician from now on. Keep up the good work!

author: Sandy B.
text: What a excellent experience we had with Michael, the owner of First Electric. We interviewed several electricians for our job of upgrading our old fluorescent lights in our garage. First Electric had the best customer service, reasonable quote and was knowledgeable about the job details. He lended great suggestions for the job. Michael is reliable, dependable, timely and professional. He makes sure the job is complete. We love our new lights, our garage is much brighter, and we will be sure to use First Electric again.

author: Scott O.
text: Great experience. Our house had some dangerous wiring going on, and First Electric came out quick and stayed late to make sure everything was in working order.

author: Susan T.
text: It's a Sunday, the fan I ordered was delivered and I desperately wanted it installed since weekday scheduling is tough for me. I yelped and his business popped up as 24/7 so I reached out and Michael was quick to reply. I shared links/photos of my fans and he was able to provide a quote (fair), contract and same day time slots. Aside me getting lucky with his schedule, he was respectful with my no outdoor shoes inside the house request since I have young children's. He ran into some hiccups during install but quickly resolved with a Home Depot run. Overall I appreciated that he was respectful, well mannered, patient and did quality work. I am particular with aesthetic so he was careful in not damaging the ceiling to the best of his ability instead of glossing over my request.

author: John H.
text: Great response and quality work at a reasonable price. Mike was prompt, personal and diagnosed my  problem with my faulty wiring in my garage. Will use them for future work.

author: kevin l.
text: Prompt response. Quoted fair value. Came and installed 2 fans quickly. Highly recommended.

author: Michael O.
text: Michael with First Electric did an excellent job.   He did the work as requested, for a good price, and on time.  He was polite and communicated clearly.  He also did a nice job keeping the worksites clean.  We will be working with Michael again.

author: Michael L.
text: Michael was prompt, punctual and professional. Highly recommend to anyone who needs reliable electrical service

author: Bernard C.
text: Michael the owner is very honest with top notch quality and honest work! Highly recommend his work to family and friends!!!

author: Alex M.
text: Michael was very professional and showed up on time like he promised, Grest service all around would recommend for future work.

author: Mark M.
text: Michael is professional and responsive. We needed help with fixing an outlet for our laundry dryer. He responded to the request on Yelp within minutes and came the next day. He was very good with communicating throughout the process. Also the work is reasonably priced.

author: Randall G.
text: Was a pleasure doing business with First Electric. Had some old ceiling boxes from the 50's replaced  with some new ones. Also fixed some minor electrical issues in the house. Michael was professional and knowledgeable of the issues going on in my house and fixed the issues with ease. Would do business with again!

author: Maria C.
text: Michael was quick to reply with a quote and his immediate availability.  He came the following day and did an excellent job replacing my Ring Floodlights. He arrived ahead of schedule and expertly replaced my camera. He is very personable, yet professional. I will definitely call on him again for all my electrical needs.  HIGHLY RECOMMEND him!  He will not disappoint!

author: Gus M.
text: Michael was great to work with.   I needed some conduit routed from my Electrical panel to a patio.  Michael was considerate of my schedule and communicated well and let me know immediately when he fell ill and rescheduled.  He completed the work exactly as we agreed on and made sure I was satisfied with the work.  I plan to continue to use him for other projects.

author: Tony A.
text: Mike was great he came in all it took him all but 5 minutes to fix this another guy was charging $350 dollars and he rigged the switch to fail Mike was honest.

author: Aaron S.
text: Service was great and professional and completed job within the estimated time. Will use again in the future.

author: Bianca R.
text: Michael is great! One of our switches in the house stopped working out of no where. We tried to turn the breaker off and on but nothing seemed to work so we took to yelp to request some quotes. Michael's quote was reasonable and he was able to come the next day. He was patient with us and took the time to educate us as well. He crawled into the attic and found that a wire was short and after fixing it we were back in business. I would definitely use him again and recommend him to other people!

author: Andrea A.
text: Quick response and excellent service. Identified problem and fixed it in a timely fashion. Will definitely and recommend and use his service again.

author: C C.
text: Michael did an amazing job! He knows what he is doing and professional. Best electrician!

author: Kalpana S.
text: Michael was very professional, ordered parts and got them delivered, arrived on time and was very thorough in performing the job. I had him install EV Charging station in my garage. He had to make room in my electrical panel and pull about 100 ft of 220 Volt wire. He knew what he was doing and finished my job leaving my place near and clean. He made sure everything was working and even texted me next day to make sure all was well. I am very happy with his service.

author: Candace S.
text: Michael was able to come on short notice and help me with multiple issues in our home. He is friendly and very professional. We appreciate how responsive he was via text/phone and his efficiency in fixing our electrical issues.

author: Steph G.
text: I had a previous electrician give a very high quote to fix my ceiling fan/light so I wanted to get another quote. Michael was very responsive and we were able to quickly schedule an appointment to easily fix the problem at a fair price. If you're looking for an electrician in La Mirada, I'd highly recommend Michael at First Electric!

author: Eric P.
text: It seemed like I was having issues with one of our breakers on an old 1954 electrical panel since half the house still had power. Michael quickly responded to check out the issue. He assessed the issue and told me it seemed like an Edison issue. I checked online and sure enough there was some sort of outage. 100% recommend Michael. The experience was like my electrician neighbor coming over as a favor!

author: Rayna S.
text: I got a new ev vehicle and needed to get a charger installed in my garage. I know absolutely nothing about electrical work, but Michael made it a really easy experience! He was able to come out next day, even during a holiday week. His communication was excellent; he was nice, on time, got the job done fairly quickly, and even cleaned up after himself. Would definitely use him again and would recommend him to a friend.

author: Josh Kim
text: I appreciate Michael's customer service and expertise. Please see attached photos he installed.

author: Michael L.
text: Michael was very quick to arrive to sort out an electrical issue with the house. His investigation was very thorough and he was able to get us back to working properly within two hours. The price was very reasonable and I would recommend his services.

author: Chris Y.
text: Few outlets stopped working and Michael came by right away, took his time to trace through the issue and fixed it. Prices are reasonable. Would definitely recommend!

author: Steve B.
text: Prompt service and fair pricing. Good communication from Michael. Happy with our ceiling fan installation.

author: Weston P.
text: I am very pleased I found Michael at First Electric for my project.  He was very responsive, on time, and professional.  He gave me a very reasonable quote (lower than some others) on installing my ceiling fan and did a great job.  I will hire again if the need presents itself.

author: Drew H.
text: Michael was very responsive and was able to come over to address my issue in less than 2 hours. He had a competitive quote, showed up and was great at troubleshooting a rather complex issue while taking the time to explain why/how he was troubleshooting the way he was. He was able to resolve the issue and I'll be reaching out to him for future electrical needs.

author: Robert R.
location: Northeast Los Angeles, Los Angeles, CA
text: Did an outstanding Job setting  up our ring doorbell. MICHAEL  was honest and up front on everything.  I highly recommend  first electric  for your home electric  projects.

author: Michelle D.
text: First Electric is a wonderful company. Michael was extremely professional, knowledgeable, speedy and competitive in pricing. I would highly recommend them for any and all of your electrical needs.

author: Henry A.
text: I highly recommend him. He's a good electrician and knows allot about systems too. He wrote a program for us to calculate the monthly electric charges for each tenant.

author: Gary M.
text: I had a great experience with First Electric. They came out to fix some wiring issues at my house and did an excellent job. The work was done quickly, safely, and with great attention to detail. They explained everything clearly, answered all my questions, and made sure everything was working perfectly before leaving. I really appreciate their professionalism and would highly recommend them to anyone needing electrical work.

author: Cynndy S.
text: Our regular electrician was not available so he recommended First Electric and what a charm Michael was to work with. He responded quickly to text messages, let us know he was on the way and his ETA. Very personable, worked efficiently and cleaned up when he was done. I would recommend him in a heartbeat.

author: Robert M.
text: Michael from First Electric is a straight up PROFESSIONAL! Came to our house on short notice to fix a potentially hazardous electrical situation in our laundry room. Grateful for his service and have him in my contacts list for all future electrical we require at home.Thanks Michael, you are the best!Robert Martinez

author: Dawn H.
text: Michael at First Electric was very friendly, Â personable and kind, a pleasure to "work" with. Â But it doesn't stop there: he changed out our fluorescent tube's w/ LEDs that are so bright. The first set of lights he ordered he felt were chinsy, so returned themâ€‹ for the ones he installed. Â The overall cost was also reasonable. Â  We are very happy customers and would want Michael again if needed.

author: Robert H.
text: My elderly in-laws had old florescent kitchen lights that went out. Called several recommended electrical companies. Michael was the only one that came out that same day told us what he could do and gave us a quote. We wanted to change from Florescent to LEDs. He ordered the parts and the following week when the parts came in, he was here and replaced the old lights. The kitchen lights are much brighter and use less wattage. His charge to us (labor and material) was very reasonable and work was done quickly and professionally. Michael has Â very pleasant personality and answered any electrical question we had. It was a "delight" to have him do the work for us!

author: Adrian M.
text: Great service and customer service. I had panel upgrade that went smoothly and other upgrades around the home.

author: Adan A.
text: I recently had the pleasure of working with Michael from First Electric LLC, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the service I received. Michael is not only highly skilled and knowledgeable as an electrician, but he also stands out for his honesty and fair pricing. He took the time to explain everything in detail and ensured the job was done right the first time. It's rare to find someone who is both professional and personable, and Michael embodies both. If you're looking for an electrician who is trustworthy, dependable, and provides excellent value, I highly recommend Michael and First Electric LLC.

author: Marilou B.
text: Michael, owner of First Electirc, was very professional,detailed and maticulous about the end result. He's very knowledgeable in installing an EV charger with 240V. Â I will difinitely recommend Michael to all my friends and family. Â I have to say "GREAT JOB MICHAEL."
